name: Bomb Voyage Demo
description:
Bomb Voyage is a game where you have to use explosives to fulfill tasks such as destroying a building or killing minions. After placing the explosives in a place you think will fulfill your task you can detonate them and view the destruction you caused. Want to see it again? You can do that by simply pressing replay. The building will be put back together and you can look at your destruction in any way you want such as in slow motion, from different angles, pausing it and scrolling back and forth through the timeline of your destruction.

This is a playtesting demo that has been made by students of NHTV during the course of: http://www.nhtv.nl/wohbo-bachelors/games/creative-media-and-game-technologies.html

You would help us greatly if you would play the game and answer our questionnaire. The questionnaire can be found here: http://goo.gl/forms/0gCrASrxYW
